about_the_game:
In The Old Ones you play as Sophia, a young ambitious archeologist specialized in the disappearance of ancient civilizations, Sophia made alongside with her team a unique and rare discovery in the Mayan ruins, unfortunately her finding got rated as top secret by the government and her team got replaced, but Sophia couldn’t resist to come alone in the night to inspect the site herself, but she didn’t expect that she’s about to enter a rabbit hole!





Encounter many unique fantasy puzzles while solving the mystery of the old ones.




Climb ruins, fight ancient creatures, and dodge traps while exploring the newly discovered Mayan temple.




Explore never seen before fantasy ruins and experience the advanced knowledge the Mayan people have reached.

Key Features:


  • Full immersion, turn off the lights, put your headset on and enjoy an unforgettable journey.
  • A thrilling story as you explore the ancient and mysterious world to uncover it's secrets.
  • Amazing adventure filled with ruins to explore, cliffs to climb, and ancient creatures to fight.
  • Well designed puzzles integrated into the fantasy ruins waiting for you to solve.
